name: Death Valley Fringe Shoulder / Cross Body Bag - Two Tone Black Leather
description:
This ultra-soft bag is meticulously handcrafted from top quality suede and distressed black leather and along with shiny nickel hardware. This bag will truly withstand the tests of time!

Features:
-Double Row of Hand Cut Fringe on One Side
-Western Yoke Design on the Reverse
-Convertible 1" (2.5 cm) x 49" (124.5 cm) Cross Body / Shoulder Strap (divide total length in half when using as a shoulder strap)
-Indian Blanket Pattern Lining
-Inside Open Divided Pocket
-Inside Zipper Pocket with a Leather Boarder
-Inside Top Notch LeatherWorks Label

Measurements (Laying Flat):
Length: 13" (33 cm)
Height at Center: 9" (23cm)
Width: 2.5" (6.5 cm)

PLEASE NOTE: This bag is super soft and super slouchy so the dimensions will change once in use to these APROXIMATE measurements:
Length: 12" (30.5cm)
Height at Center: 8" (20.5 cm)
Width: 4.5" (11.5 cm)

name: Death Valley Fringe Shoulder / Cross Body Bag - Brown Suede with Indian Blanket
description:
This ultra-soft bag is meticulously handcrafted from top quality suede and heavy Indian blanket print twill along with shiny nickel hardware. This bag will truly withstand the tests of time!

Features:
-Single Row of Hand Cut Fringe or tan Indian Blanket Print Twill
-Brown Suede Western Yoke Design on the Reverse with tan Indian blanket twill
-Convertible 1" (2.5 cm) x 49" (124.5 cm) Cross Body / Shoulder Strap (divide total length in half when using as a shoulder strap)
-Deep Red Ultra Suede Lining
-Inside Open Divided Pocket
-Inside Zipper Pocket with a Leather Boarder
-Inside Top Notch LeatherWorks Label

Measurements (Laying Flat):
Length: 13" (33 cm)
Height at Center: 9" (23cm)
Width: 2.5" (6.5 cm)

PLEASE NOTE: This bag is super soft and super slouchy so the dimensions will change once in use to these APROXIMATE measurements:
Length: 12" (30.5cm)
Height at Center: 8" (20.5 cm)
Width: 4.5" (11.5 cm)

name: Baja Style Chopper Wallet - Leather with Mexican Blanket
description:
This durable double snap wallet is made from top quality soft distressed leather that will break in quickly while holding up for years to come.

FEATURES:
-Mexican Blanket Insert with Black or Brown Distressed Leather
-Double Nickel Snap Closure
-Nickel D-Ring for Attaching a Wallet Chain (Wallet Chain Not Included)
-Inside Zipper Pocket
-Three Open Pockets. The Majority of Currencies Will Lay Flat (Including but not limited to US Dollar, Japanese Yen, Euros and other European currency, Australian Dollar, and Pesos of course!)
-Two Credit Card / ID Pockets
-Top Notch Leatherworks Logo on the inside center pocket

MEASUREMENTS (when closed):
Length:  7.5” ( 19 cm)
Height: 4”  (10 cm)
